Class Download_Data

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mk4droid.IMC_Services.Download_Data

  • public class Download_Data
extends Object
    This class performs the data downloading from the remote server
    Author:
    Dimitrios Ververidis for the Multimedia Group (http://mklab.iti.gr).

      • Download_Issues

        public static String Download_Issues(double x0down,
                     double x0up,
                     double y0down,
                     double y0up,
                     int IssueNolimit)
        Download issues in a certain geographic rectangle
        Parameters:
        x0down - minimum longitude of the rectangle
        x0up - maximum longitude of the rectangle
        y0down - minimum latitude of the rectangle
        y0up - maximum latitude of the rectangle
        IssueNolimit - maximum number of issues to download within this rectangle starting from the most recent ones
        Returns:
